game.name: Two: Solar Home
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: local co-op platformer game for two players, featuring impressive pixel art and handcrafted levels. Players take on the roles of a brother and sister exploring the collapsed solar system and the silent, deserted space of their once-thriving home to uncover past secrets.
game.shortDescriptionEn: local co-op platformer game for two players, featuring impressive pixel art and handcrafted levels. Players take on the roles of a brother and sister exploring the collapsed solar system and the silent, deserted space of their once-thriving home to uncover past secrets.
